name: Bekant T. Blanc and the Meteor of Doom!
name_original: Bekant T. Blanc and the Meteor of Doom!
description:
Trapped as the sole human on an out-of-date VLS class spaceship orbiting Uranus, only Bekant T. Blanc can SAVE THE EARTH!

A text adventure game with puzzles to solve, Brewbots to outwit, and a great many silly situations to get out of.
